description: End users may experience a risk of information disclosure due to vulnerabilities in Windows Cryptographic Services on affected systems. Specific build numbers that may be impacted include Windows 10 versions 10.0.19045.4412, 10.0.22631.3593, and older versions such as 10.0.10240.20651. The key KB Articles related to this issue are KB-5037771, KB-5037770, and KB-5037788, which detail security updates addressing the vulnerabilities. Users may not see an immediate error message, but sensitive information could be unintentionally exposed, leading to potential unauthorized access to data. This situation emphasizes the importance of applying the latest updates to mitigate risks effectively.
